name: Loc7
description: THIS ONE IS TWO WADS COMBINED. IT'S ACTUALLY LOC1.WAD & ARNO.WAD. LOC1.WAD REPLACES THE FIRST LEVEL WITH AN ARENA TYPE DEATHMATCH. ARNO.WAD REPLACES THE PLAYER RELATED SOUNDFX ONLY. (WARNING) THE WADFILE CONTAINS PROFANITY FROM ARNOLD SCHWARZENEGGER MOVIES. IF YOU DON'T LIKE PROFANITY, DON'T RUN IT. THANX! THE COMPLETE VERSION OF ARNOLD.WAD INCLUDING REPLACEMENT OF MONSTER SOUNDS WILL SOON BE AVAILABLE AT CD-ROM.COM.
